::DarkMouse::

She sighed and walked out of the lab.  She went to her console and 
looked around.  She sat with her face in her hands.  She felt sick.  
She had let three bots run past her and escape.  She hadn't been any 
help to Scorponok.  She just wanted to crawl down a hole and die.  
And she knew that if Megatron got mad at her, that's just what would 
happen to her. Only she wouldn't crawl, she would be blown to inferno.
She knew her life was as good as slag.  Her one love didn't show much 
feeling towards her anymore.  Megatron, the leader whom she tried to 
make proud of her, now thought of her as a punching bag and not as a 
helpful, loyal bot.  She sat there and sighed.  What can I do, she 
thought to herself. She got up and walked back to the lab.  she 
didn't even look at SCorponok, she just started to clean things up.

She picked up a few boxes and put them away.  She found viles and 
other instruments on the floor.  She did her best to tidy up the lab.
She came across a black box, one she had seen before but didn't know 
what it did.  She went over to hand it to SCorponok.  "This was one 
thing you ordered me not to mess with. Here you are commander." she 
put it on the counter next to Scorponok and continued to clean up the 
lab.
